dsense.name: breaking
dsense.guideword: informal (breakdancing: street dance style) (街舞风格)

example.eg: Breaking takes energy and athleticism.
If you play ball in the house, you will break something.
example.egtrans: 你要在房子里玩球，会砸破东西的。

example.eg: Alan broke his arm when he fell. Janis broke two ribs when she slipped on the ice.
example.egtrans: 艾伦摔倒时，摔断了手臂。珍妮丝在冰面上滑倒时，摔断了两根肋骨。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 折断（骨头）, 使（骨头）破裂

example.eg: The home team broke the champions' winning streak.
example.egtrans: 冠军队连连获胜的好运被主队打断了。

example.eg: The window broke, and now there's glass all over the floor.
example.egtrans: 窗户碎了，现在地板上到处都是玻璃碴。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 打碎, 破碎, 粉碎

example.eg: Our old television finally broke.
example.egtrans: 我们那台老电视终于坏掉了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 坏掉, 出故障, 损坏

example.eg: A break from training gave the football players a rest.
example.egtrans: 足球队员停止训练，休息了一会儿。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 休息，歇息, 间歇，暂停，休息，间断

example.eg: There will be no classes until after Christmas break.
example.egtrans: 圣诞假期结束之前都不上课了。

example.eg: Will suffered a bad break when he went skiing.
example.egtrans: 威尔去滑冰时骨折了。

example.eg: A break from discussions will give us time to gather more information.
example.egtrans: 暂停讨论能让我们有时间收集更多信息。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 打破, 违反, 未能履行

example.eg: Miranda went to Hollywood, looking for her big break.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 突破口, 机会, 机遇

example.eg: The children slipped through a break in the fence.
example.egtrans: 孩子们从篱笆的裂缝处窜了过去。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 裂口, 裂缝, 破裂处

example.eg: They are waiting for a break in the storm.
example.egtrans: 他们在等着风暴停止，天气突变。

example.eg: The guards weren't expecting the prisoners' break for the door.
example.egtrans: 守卫没料到犯人们会往门口猛冲，意图逃跑。

example.eg: Sam is heading for a break with his girlfriend.
The break in his voice is a sign of puberty, as he goes from bass to alto with no control.
example.egtrans: 变声是他步入青春期的迹象，他的声音从低音变到中音，没法控制。

example.eg: It was raining, so we spent the whole of break in the classroom.
example.egtrans: 雨一直下个不停，所以我们整个课间休息都是在教室度过的。

example.eg: When a tennis player wins a game during which their opponent was serving, it is called a break.
When I play pool, I always like to break.
The water balloon broke.
example.egtrans: 水气球突然破裂了。

example.eg: The long-distance connection broke.
example.egtrans: 远程连接中断了。

example.eg: The meeting will break at noon.
The dawn is about to break.
example.egtrans: 拂晓将至。

example.eg: His health broke after years of toil.
example.egtrans: 长年累月的辛劳把他的身体拖垮了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: （健康状况）变糟糕, 垮掉, （身体）变衰弱

example.eg: His voice started to break when he was 13.
example.egtrans: 他13岁的时候开始变声。

example.eg: After an hour's discussion, the committee broke for a coffee and a bite to eat.
example.egtrans: 在几个小时的讨论过后，委员会成员中断了讨论，去喝咖啡，吃东西了。

example.eg: The drag racers broke the speed limit.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 违反, 打破, 破坏

example.eg: The boxer's blocking move broke the force of his opponent's blow.
example.egtrans: 拳击手的封锁动作削弱了对手的攻击。

example.eg: The actor wants to break his contract.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使…失效, 废除, 宣告…无效

example.eg: The boxer threatened to break his opponent.
The collector doesn't want to break the set.
Can you break a dollar?
The drill broke through the door of the safe.
The army is trying to break the enemy code.
The convicts broke jail.
Our team broke the record for number of games won.
The card shark broke the house.
The pitcher broke a wicked curve that got the corner of the plate.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 投出（曲线球）, 使(球)曲线飞行

example.eg: The interrogation broke the soldier's spirit.
Bubbles broke the surface of the water.
No matter what I try, I can't break this problem.
The cowboy tried to break the new stallion.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 制服, 驯服, 驯养

example.eg: A newspaper broke the story.
The challenger broke his opponent's serve.
The police broke his alibi.
The man was cited for breaking the speed limit.
example.egtrans: 那个人因为驾驶超速而被传讯。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 超出, 超过, 超越

example.eg: Criminals broke into the house.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 强行闯入, 破门而入

example.eg: Tim couldn't wait for recess and the chance to get out of this boring math class.
example.egtrans: 提姆迫不及待地想要课间休息，好逃出这无聊的数学课。

example.eg: There are three deep recesses in the wall.
example.egtrans: 墙上有三个深深的凹进处。

example.eg: The defence asked for a short recess to examine the new evidence.
example.egtrans: 被告方要求休庭，以检查新的证据。

example.eg: The court will recess for lunch.
Amanda recessed the lights in her living room.
Frank did back-breaking work on the farm for over 50 years.
The youth was arrested on suspicion of breaking and entering the victim's home.
They interrupted the nature program to report breaking news.
example.egtrans: 他们中断了自然节目来报告最新消息。

example.eg: The physics students are testing the breaking points of different metals.
example.egtrans: 物理系学生正在测试不同金属的强度极限。

example.eg: Tony was under a lot of stress and he eventually reached breaking point.
The breaking up of ice shelves has been blamed on global warming.
He received the Nobel Prize for his groundbreaking research in genetics.
example.egtrans: 由于在遗传学方面开创性的研究，他荣获诺贝尔奖。

example.eg: In late breaking news, the president has just announced her resignation.
The union forbids strikebreaking during official strikes.
